about_the_game:
A package to both support yourself in game and to support the developers. If you are finding it too difficult to beat the game and want to increase the action, or if you just want to support the developers, you can get the following perks.

  • 2 Extra Lives
  • Double Jump
  • Power Regenerates Twice As Fast
  • Power Resets to 100% On Level Start
  • 20% Faster Run Speed
  • Increase Your Maximum Health By 25%
  • 50% Better Chance For Health Drops
  • Health Drops Heal 75% More
  • Awesome Sombrero Hat
detailed_description:
A package to both support yourself in game and to support the developers. If you are finding it too difficult to beat the game and want to increase the action, or if you just want to support the developers, you can get the following perks.

  • 2 Extra Lives
  • Double Jump
  • Power Regenerates Twice As Fast
  • Power Resets to 100% On Level Start
  • 20% Faster Run Speed
  • Increase Your Maximum Health By 25%
  • 50% Better Chance For Health Drops
  • Health Drops Heal 75% More
  • Awesome Sombrero Hat

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: opengl4.3 or vulkan compatible graphics card
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: opengl4.3 or vulkan compatible graphics card

name: Knockout Daddy - Support Package

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: A package to both support yourself in game and to support the developers. If you are finding it too difficult to beat the game and want to increase the action, or if you just want to support the developers, you can get some perks.
